resources.string:
Your Strength Score is calculated from:
 • Your 1RM (best perf in the last 3 months)
 • Dumbbell/barbell exercises, separated by muscle group
 • Sex, age and body weight (adjusted standards)


The score reflects your absolute AND relative strength, and evolves according to your progress and physical changes.

 Click on each muscle group to see the exercises that make it up.
